Reviews.Title: sour on Hitachi
Reviews.Author: TRM
Reviews.Content: TV died after two years. It has been in the shop waiting for parts from Hitachi for 6 months. Hitachi calls me weekly to tell me the part is not in yet and there is no estimate on the arrival date. One plus is that if the part ever is found Hitachi will pay for it even though it was two months out of warranty.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD1080 High-Definition Display (1920 x 1080 Resolution)
ClearWindowTM Plasma Technology
PictureMasterTM HD V Video Processor
Reel60TM 3 HDMI SimplayHDTM 1080p Compatible Inputs
SDTM Card Photo Viewer
ProductInfo.Name: Hitachi P60X901 60" Director's Series HD1080 Plasma HDTV
